rows.label: bf06230100_0010
rows.name:
H-hey, Nia...
Do you, um, mind...?

rows.label: bf06230100_0020
rows.name: Hehe, c'mooon, it's not so bad.

rows.label: bf06230100_0030
rows.name: You're just so warm. I can't help it!

rows.label: bf06230100_0040
rows.name:
It's a function of what's
known as "infrared radiation".

rows.label: bf06230100_0050
rows.name: Gramps knows everything.

rows.label: bf06230100_0060
rows.name: I'm...not your personal heater, you know...

rows.label: bf06230100_0070
rows.name: M-my lady...

rows.label: bf06230100_0080
rows.name:
If you desire warmth,
why not take some from me?

rows.label: bf06230100_0090
rows.name: Homura-sama seems to be in some distress...

rows.label: bf06230100_0100
rows.name: No way.

rows.label: bf06230100_0110
rows.name:
Your fur is all stiff and spiky with the cold,
it'd be murder on my sensitive skin.

rows.label: bf06230100_0120
rows.name: But, my lady...

rows.label: bf06230100_0130
rows.name:
Hey, is it just me, or are the
ether lines really dim?

rows.label: bf06230100_0140
rows.name: What is meaning of "ether lines"?

rows.label: bf06230100_0150
rows.name:
Y'know, those things, the glowing
threads that run inside a Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf06230100_0160
rows.name:
That is the glow of pure ether
coursing through the Divine Beast's body.

rows.label: bf06230100_0170
rows.name: You can compare it to the bloodstream of a human.

rows.label: bf06230100_0180
rows.name: You've got good eyes.

rows.label: bf06230100_0190
rows.name:
Genbu has pretty bad circulation,
compared to other Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf06230100_0200
rows.name:
They say it's why we have a
cold climate and awful crops.

rows.label: bf06230100_0210
rows.name: So it's...cold-blooded?

rows.label: bf06230100_0220
rows.name: Heh, call it what you like.
